name: SLIDEZLE
description:
A game of strategic skill, SLIDEZLE combines the fun of puzzling and the complexity of algorithmic patterns . 

Choose the difficulty level by selecting the number of pieces you wish to solve. Difficulty ranges from 4 squares to 100.  After choosing a photo from the right sidebar, the game will randomly shuffle the pieces of your image of choice.  The object of the game is to unscramble the pieces and restore the image. 

To do so, you will need to slide the pieces, either horizontally or vertically (by dragging them in the desired direction), and rotate them (via double clicking).

 A check mark will appear when a piece is correctly positioned.


The game keeps track of the number of moves that have been made, plus the high score for each level. 

Want an extra challenge? Be on the lookout for hidden levels!
